value.name: Palace aides 'blocked Harry from joining King Charles in Sandringham' during his UK trip
value.description: Prince Harry was forced to stay in a hotel as aides reportedly worried they would “never get rid of him” if he lodged at Sandringham while visiting the King. The Duke of Sussex is said to be open to taking a temporary role back in the fold to help his father while Charles III undergoes treatment for cancer.

value.description: Prince William has told friends there is zero chance brother Prince Harry will be allowed back into the royal fold. The Prince of Wales is so angered by his brother’s continued attack on the monarchy he will block any of his bids to return to The Firm, writes The Mirror.
